body.name: OFNEX Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth 5.3 Headphones 90 Hrs Playtime Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case Over-Ear Sports Earphones Waterproof Deep Bass Headset

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 1.【90 Hours Playtime & Wireless Charging】Each earbud offers up to 8 hours of continuous listening time on a single charge. When paired with the charging case, X19 Wireless Earbuds deliver a remarkable total of 90 hours of uninterrupted music playback. You have the flexibility to recharge these bluetooth headphones using the provided USB-C cable or wirelessly with any Qi-certified charging pad (charging pad not included). Moreover, the built-in dual LED power display enhances battery status visibility for both the case and headphones.

2.【Hi-Fi Stereo Audio & Crystal-clear Call】Featuring a 14.2 mm dual-chamber speaker driver unit, these bluetooth earbuds are precision-engineered to deliver crisp, balanced sound with deep bass. They provide an immersive surround sound experience that you can enjoy on the go. Additionally, the inclusion of two exclusive built-in microphones significantly enhances the performance of conference calls, ensuring that your voice comes through with clarity and volume during phone conversations. Ideal for web meetings and online classes.

3.【Designed for Sports & IPX7 Waterproof】Boasting a comfortable, ergonomic design with flexible, secure-fit ear hooks, these wireless earphones snugly and securely fit into your ears, even during vigorous exercise, preventing any unwelcome slips. With the inclusion of four pairs of rubber ear tips in various sizes (XS, S, M, L), you can enjoy a fatigue-free and painless listening experience, even if you have smaller ears. IPX7 waterproof rating guarantees protection against water droplets and sweat, making these wireless sports earbuds the perfect choice for workouts, running, and gym sessions.

4.【Bluetooth 5.3 & Auto quick Pairing】Adopting advanced wireless technology, these in-ear ear buds will automatically connect with your device quickly once taking them out from the charging case (After the first successful connection). With upgraded Bluetooth 5.3 technology, you can get a faster transfer speed and a more stable connection, sync audio and video without delay, widely compatible with most iOS/Android smartphones, TV, computer, Laptop, smart watch etc,.

5.【Independent Volume Controls & One-key Reset】Equipped with separate multi-function and volume buttons, these bluetooth headset enable you to easily control music, manage calls, and activate voice assistants. Each true wireless earbud has complete volume and track control functions, allowing you to manage all features even when using just one earbud. For added convenience, the charging case is equipped with a reset button, streamlining the reset process. Simply press and hold the reset button to instantly restore these wireless headphones to their factory settings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 One-button Reset 2 USB-C & Wireless Charging 3 Wide Compatibility 4 IPX7 Waterproof

Are these wireless earbuds suitable for small ears? The X19 Wireless Earbuds come with XS, S, M, L eartips for all types of ears. If you have smaller ears, you can opt for XS eartips. Do these bluetooth headphones have a separate volume control button? Yes, Unlike other sports earbuds, the X19 bluetooth headphones have a separate volume control button for user convenience, plus each headset can perform all the multi-function controls individually. Are these comfortable to wear when workout? Boasting a comfortable, ergonomic design with flexible, secure-fit ear hooks, these wireless earbuds snugly and securely fit into your ears even during vigorous exercise, preventing any unwelcome slips. Can these bluetooth headphones connect to my phone? The X19 bluetooth headphones are compatible with most devices that support Bluetooth connectivity, include iOS/Android phone, TV, watch, Computer, Laptop. Are these wireless earbuds water and sweat resistant ? X19 Wireless Earbuds are IPX7 water-resistant. The earbuds are designed to be resistant against dust and drops of water but aren’t meant to be submerged under water. We don't recommend you wear them in heavy rain or wash them with running water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a MUST-BUY!!
reviews.reviewText: To say that I am blown away with the quality of these earbuds would be a gross understatement! They were delivered on-time and come in beautiful packaging that is very thoughtfully designed and demonstrated.Even the video promo reviews that have been posted on their product page don't describe how delightful these earbuds really are, so let me take a few minutes and tell you why these earbuds deliver INCREDIBLE "Bang for YOUR Buck"!1. Exceptionally simple and clear instructions on product usage (translation errors forgiven). 😉2. Thoughtful, attractive and complete product design, labeling and packaging.3. World class stereo "HI-FI" sound and tonal quality with such a powerful bass response you'll swear you're in a movie theater featuring DOLBY Atmos.4. Excellent Bluetooth reception when using it's phone call features; even from 30+ feet away with no loss of call/conversation clarity.5. Full voice assistant capabilities for BOTH Android and Apple devices, even though the instruction manual/booklet doesn't explicitly state that.6. Earpiece gives helpful and discrete voice prompts and alerts for it's status while in use and offers virtual Caller ID functionality.7. Earpieces can be used singly, or together, with each one still retaining full functionality.8. Over-the-ear hook is incredibly comfortable EVEN if one wears glasses. No acclimation period needed!9. Earpieces fit so comfortably and securely in place over your ear(s) that you may not feel like you're even wearing one/them, despite engaging in intense physical activity!10. Full Lifetime (Worry/Hassle/Return Free) Warranty!! Although, I can't imagine ever giving up THESE 💎 💎 for another brand.However, if there was any one thing that I would question about these earbuds, it would be the apparent lack of "Mute" capability as I don't see that functionality listed in the manual. Nevertheless, that is NOT a hindrance for me as these wireless earpieces seem to be so excellent with everything else they do I can live happily without that feature and enjoy their overwhelming value and user-friendliness. 🙂⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HUGE bang for your buck!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting that I would just get what I paid for. Let me tell you that the value is far superior to what I paid! Worth noting, I use headphones/earbuds for work and recreation, and I am a headphone/earbud junkie! The fit on these, as well as the sound, is pretty darn good! I have several pairs of Bose and Apple AirPods which are each great in their own way. But, the fact that these earbuds actually stay in, the music has bass, and the controls are simple is enough for me to highly recommend them and these are a fraction of the cost of the other two brands I mentioned!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are fricken amazing
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for relatively cheap and reliable bluetooth headphones, I think these will fit that requirement. I didn't have much expectation going in especially since they're really cheap on sale, but as my first pair of headphones these were exactly what I was going for. They fit fine on my ear and the audio quality is good. I also like the button layout once I learned the controls. The different sized spread of earbuds they give you were really nice, I used the smallest pair and it felt pretty good in my ear. I normally don't like stuff in my ears, but these didn't bug me all. The battery life on them is good for a whole day at least and the charging case has a bigger battery than I expected. I fully charged the case when I got it, and have used a single earbud all day on 7 separate occasions and the battery on the case has only dropped down to 81% without charging it at all. These headphones and case definitely exceeded my expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These earbuds are great! Connecting to phone was easy and straightforward...took all of 5 seconds. The sound is loud and crisp. The mic is clear on phone calls. These earbuds don't fall off like other brands do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound quality, but ..............
reviews.reviewText: This is a strange market. There are dozens of different brands of wireless earbuds in this price range that all look surprisingly similar. I purchased a set prior to this one that had horrible audio quality. Horrible on both music and audio books. Yet the reviews were nearly all 5 star. And there were a lot of reviews.Luckily on my next purchase I landed on this set of wireless earbuds. The audio quality is absolutely perfect. I compared the sound quality to the internal speaker of my iPhone 15; a pair of legacy style hard wired earbuds; and a pair of wired Bluetooth earbuds that I am very fond of. There was no difference in quality. Just excellent.Functionally these are great. They turn on when you take them out of the case and turn off when you put them back in the case. The whole concept of charging from the battery within the case is brilliant. I wish I had thought of that.The nit I have to pick is with how they have implemented the functionality of the plus and minus buttons. I'm used to a quick push on the plus button to raise the volume a tiny amount and a quick push on the minus button to lower the volume a tiny amount. Then a long push on either button to advance or rewind a set amount. What happens here is a short push does the advance/rewind and a long push is required to change volume. I am finding it almost impossible to change the volume a small amount.Your mileage may vary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First impression: comfortable fit, light weight, the ear pieces and the case all feel really well made. The sound is decent with good clarity. They’re not the most robust sound I’ve heard like in the noise blocking buds, but I prefer to not blow out my eardrums. For me, the sound is just right!I’ve only just received them so I have no judgement yet on battery use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these for a trip but they didn't arrive in time. I thought about canceling the order but so glad i didn't! They are comfortable and actually stay in my ears, easy to pair with my phone and unexpectedly good sound quality. Ill ne lucky if my son doesnt steal them on me to keep for himself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek Quality design and super comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Sleek design. Quality materials and super comfortable. The sound quality was impeccable and I enjoy the modern touch of reading out the digital remaining battery life.
